summary: Bon Jovi, from New Jersey, USA, is a legendary rock group formed in 1983. Led by singer Jon Bon Jovi, they've sold over 120 million albums worldwide. Their third album, *Slippery When Wet* (1986), made them superstars with hits like "Livin' on a Prayer." They've since released many successful albums, including *New Jersey*, *Keep the Faith*, and *Crush*. The band has evolved, replacing members and experimenting with different sounds, even winning a Grammy for their country-rock blend. Inductees of the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, Bon Jovi continues to tour and inspire fans.
title: Bon Jovi
